DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy Drug-Eluting Balloon first bare metal stent compare drug-eluting stent treatment de novo lesion ( DEB first ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Drug Eluting Balloon Drug Eluting Stent
DOC.detailed_description: A recent trial test premount bare metal stent drug-eluting balloon fail demonstrate non-inferiority safety compare drug-eluting stent alone treatment coronary artery stenosis . We think inappropriate drug delivery diseased vessel due stent strut might affect efficacy drug-eluting balloon . Therefore , design clinical study different protocol , , drug-eluting balloon first bare metal stent implantation comparison drug-eluting stent .
DOC.criteria: De novo lesion 2.5mm = < Reference diameter = < 4mm Lesion length = < 28mm Type A , B1/B2 lesion STsegment elevation MI Reference diameter < 2.5mm > 4mm Bifurcation lesion Type C lesion history AMI stroke within 1 year F. chronic renal disease ( Cr > 2mg/dL )
